channel.title: Good VPS Server hosting?
channel.description:
Anyone know some good VPS server hosting? What I sorta need is like...
[b]No lag 24/7(obviously) You know, just a good overall VPS hosting[/b]
Thanks!

item.title: Good VPS Server hosting?
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:6, topic:231629”][quote author=sw1tchez link=topic=305093.msg2444956#msg2444956 date=1221681311]
Well, Idk, I don’t really wanna host it, but how much would the dedicated server’s cost? I thought that WAS VPS? I might be confused, but thanks

[/quote]
To be honest, i have no idea of dedicated servers. I mean i wouldn’t pay money for a cheapass private server IMO. And aren’t they like 100 quid a month or somethin?[/quote]
Hmm, quid, well im from canada, so does that mean like dollars?
And na, thats for like a super-duper fast thing that wont lag with like 10k people on, good ones (sorta like what delta is using) is like 40 dollars per month, but yeah, my server isnt really like a super cheap one, its a 508, Probably more farther then anyone else’, except pali of course And I plan on making it like runescape, not like ‘AWMAFGAWD I JUNDE 5 MNSO GAO AND 99 STRENTHS AND 500M!’ lol xD

ANYWAYS, back on topic, but yeah, I just want a 24/7 server, im sick of hosting it on my comp.

Read full topic
